Name: Trivia Party
About the game: A mix of trivia and a classic board game. What else can you ask from a game to enjoy with your friends and family? Trivia Party is a local multiplayer game that mixes a ludo game and a trivia competition. Obtain better results in the trivia, and get a better dice for the ludo. Enjoy a healthy competition with your family and friends. Answer the questions better and faster than your competitors, and achieve to get all your stones to the end of the ludo to win the game. Features: Up to 4 players in local multiplayer mode. Supports multiple controllers at the same time. New concept of ludo game, with multiple dices. Compete in more than 15 trivia categories. You can also compete with a difficult customized CPU. ⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀
